alert.note: Alert for Northern Elko County; Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range; South Central Elko County; Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County; Southwest Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 30 at 1:25PM PST by NWS Elko
info.description: ...Temperatures well below normal expected tonight into Tuesday morning... Temperatures well below the normal are expected to continue tonight into Tuesday morning, with potential for locations to reach into the negative double digits. Some of our coldest locations could even see temperature drop well into the negative 20s. Cold conditions could cause frostbite and hypothermia if precautions are not taken, with conditions potentially being lethal for those unprepared and/or unprotected. If traveling or staying outside for extend periods of time, make sure to dress in layers and cover up exposed skin. Visit www.weather.gov/elko for the latest weather information.
